forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High near 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 39F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
